item.title: Havells Instanio 3-L
item.dc:creator: Mukesh
item.description:
Havells Instanio 3-Litre Instant Geyser (White/Blue), Wall Mount

The post Havells Instanio 3-L appeared first on Om Electrical.
item.content:encoded:
About this item

  • LED Indicator: Colour-changing LEDs that change from blue to amber to indicate the hotness of the water
  • Outer Body: Rust and shock proof ABS outer body for long life
  • Inner Tank: Stainless steel inner tank of 304 grade
  • Power Cord: Fire retardant power cord for maximum safety
  • 0.65 MPa Bar Pressure: Suitable for high rise buildings and pressure pump applications
  • ISI Marked and ISI certification
  • Capacity: 3 liters, Heating element: Copper Heating element

The post Havells Instanio 3-L appeared first on Om Electrical.

item.title: Crompton Gracee 5-L
item.dc:creator: Mukesh
item.description:
Crompton Gracee 5-L Instant Water Heater (Geyser), Wall Mounting

The post Crompton Gracee 5-L appeared first on Om Electrical.
item.content:encoded:
About this item

  • PRODUCT: Crompton’s 5L instant water heater with fast heating function
  • TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS: Wattage: 3000W; Capacity: 5L; Pressure 6.5 bar
  • WARRANTY: 5 year warranty on Tank, 2 year warranty on Element and 2 year warranty on Product provided by Crompton from date of purchase
  • 4 LEVEL SAFETY: Steam Thermostat, automatic thermal cut-out, pressure release valve and a fusible plug to ensure complete safety.
  • ANTI-RUST: Rust free PP body along with a weldless tank design that enhances resistance to corrosion and ensures long life

The post Crompton Gracee 5-L appeared first on Om Electrical.
